mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_express_order( lading_bill_no, waybill_no, gross_weight, goods_name, receiver, receiver_address, receiver_phone, receiver_idcard, rela_no, sender, sender_address, sender_phone, quantity, goods_value, total_price )values
( #{item.ladingBillNo}, #{item.waybillNo}, #{item.grossWeight}, #{item.goodsName}, #{item.receiver}, #{item.receiverAddress}, #{item.receiverPhone}, #{item.receiverIdcard}, #{item.relaNo}, #{item.sender}, #{item.senderAddress}, #{item.senderPhone}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.goodsValue}, #{item.totalPrice}, )
